attributes.action: Introduce Clean Medicine for Infants In The UK
attributes.additional_details: Our young children deserve to have healthier options available for them so that our children can prosper and have a greater start in life. The goverment introduced healthier meal options within schools so why not in our childrens medicine
attributes.background: The UK Goverment should consider to introduce clean medicine for infants within the UK. The leading brands of medicine for children within the UK contain many preservatives in the form of E- Numbers and Sugar which lead to hyperactivity and many other side effects.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action that is within their direct responsibility. 

The Medicines and Healthcare Regulatory Agency (MHRA) is responsible for the regulation of medicines. You can read more about their work here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/medicines-and-healthcare-products-regulatory-agency/about
